name: Halloween Blocks Saga - Puzzle Game With Scary and Creepy Halloween Theme
name_original: Halloween Blocks Saga - Puzzle Game With Scary and Creepy Halloween Theme
description:
Halloween is coming and sure you want the best Free Puzzle Game On The Market for your Halloween Night.

You will have scares not by the Evil Death Angel inside the game lurking around the game area but by the challenging puzzles that will drive your crazy and nuts in further levels.

Total of 25 levels How far can you go?

Halloween Blocks Saga is inspired by Tangram with many levels. Match the correct blocks in their places and complete the levels. Time is limited so make sure you be quick with your mind and solve the puzzles.

Gameplay is easy and fun with intuitive touch controls.

Warning Game is highly addictive!

It is a super puzzle world of witches, wizards, death angels, mages, demons and the great old ones so beware danger is everywhere!
